name: application-template
description: A template for building HarperDB applications

scripts.login:
bash -c 'read -r -p "Cluster URL: " URL; read -r -p "Cluster Username: " USERNAME; read -r -s -p "Cluster Password: " PASSWORD; echo; printf "CLI_TARGET='%s'
CLI_TARGET_USERNAME='%s'
CLI_TARGET_PASSWORD='%s'
" "$URL" "$USERNAME" "$PASSWORD" > .env'
scripts.deploy: npx -y dotenv-cli -- harperdb deploy . restart=rolling replicated=true
